Radancy is the global talent technology leader intelligently solving the most critical challenges for employers and delivering results that strengthen their organizations. Our unified platform, augmented by rich data and deep industry expertise, is revolutionizing how employers attract and hire the talent they need.

Headquartered in New York City with a footprint that spans the world, we are one company committed to predicting, defining, and creating the future of our industry in partnership with our 1000+ clients.

Want to see what we can achieve together? Learn more at https://www.radancy.com

NAME: Bath Fitter
DESCRIPTION: Bath Fitter is a leading manufacturer and installer of premium quality acrylic bathtubs and one-piece seamless walls with operations in the U.S. and Canada. Our enthusiastic and resourceful team takes pride in making people smile every time they see their bath. We thrive on teamwork and professionalism and ensure Bath Fitter products and customer service are second to none.

NAME: Open Systems International
DESCRIPTION:
Open Systems International, Inc. (OSI) is the world leader in the Operations Technology (OT) field. We develop and supply state-of -the-art energy management, optimization and control software solutions to energy utility companies worldwide.
These solutions include Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA) systems, Network Management Systems (NMS), Energy Management Systems (EMS), Distribution Management Systems (DMS), Outage Management Systems (OMS), Generation Management Systems (GMS), Substation Automation (SA) Systems, Data Warehousing (Historian) Analytics, Distributed Energy Resource Management Systems (DERMS), Situational Awareness Systems, individual software and hardware products, and Smart Grid solutions for utility operations. OSI's solutions empower its users to meet their operational challenges, day in and day out, with unsurpassed reliability and a minimal cost of technology ownership and maintenance.
MISSION:
Mission: We are relentless in our pursuit of total user satisfaction. At OSI, architectural elegance, innovation, simplicity, security, openness and user-friendliness are the cornerstones of our design philosophies.
OSI is one of the most passionate and customer-centric companies in the automation space. Our strong, pragmatic engineering resources are the best in the industry and are relentless in their pursuit of perfection. We try very hard to exceed our clients' expectations in every respect.

NAME:
Northwest Center
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION:
We are a leader in advancing equal opportunities for children and adults with developmental disabilities. Our award-winning services for children provide early intervention, inclusive early childhood education, and after school programs. Services for adults include supported employment, job training and placement. Our unique social enterprise model allows our programs to thrive through a sustainable combination of philanthropy, profits from our own inclusive businesses, donations collected by The Big Blue Truck™, and program revenue. Northwest Center touches the lives of nearly 1,000 families annually.

Since 1965, our mission has been to promote the growth, development and independence of people with developmental disabilities through programs of education, rehabilitation and work opportunity. Today, Northwest Center has grown into one of the largest human services organizations in Washington State.
See more at: http://www.nwcenter.org

NAME: SoftNice
DESCRIPTION:
SoftNice, Inc is a leading Global Consulting, IT Services and Staffing company since 2001, offering a wider range of solutions customized to the needs of demanding industries and diversified business environment.
We provide solutions to our clients identifying new businesses and technological trends using our industrial knowledge, service-offering expertise and technological capabilities.
SoftNice has been Ranked 3rd fastest growing Asian American Business (USPAACA) and also enjoy Ranked 41 Fastest growing IT Company in USA (Inc. Magazine).
Softnice with its value based partnerships is able to maintain a healthy 5+ yrs of average working relationship with its key customers.
SoftNice team provides 100% assurance on the following key areas:
• High Quality Resources
• Quick Turnaround
• Highly Competitive pricing.
We are Certified Partners of –
• VMWare Partner • Microsoft Gold Partner
• Check Point Stars Partner • Palo Alto Networks
• CISCO • EMC2 Business Partner

NAME: Kabbage
DESCRIPTION:
Kabbage is a leading FinTech company changing the way small businesses solve cash-flow challenges. Fully automated and deeply connected with its 185,000+ customers, Kabbage provides access to funding in minutes, extends more than $10 million every day to small businesses, and powers borrowing experiences for some of the largest companies in the world.

While we've received numerous awards and recognition—such as Entrepreneur's Top Company Cultures, Inc Magazine's Top Private Companies, Glassdoor’s Best Places to Work, and Forbes FinTech 50—it is our people, our culture, and our leaders that make Kabbage such a great place to work.

NAME:
Charles River Development
Part of State Street
DESCRIPTION:
Investment firms, asset owners, wealth managers, hedge funds and insurers in more than 30 countries rely on Charles River’s front and middle office investment management platform to manage more than US$29 Trillion in assets. Together with State Street’s middle and back office capabilities, Charles River’s cloud-deployed software technology forms the foundation of State Street Alpha℠. The Charles River Investment Management Solution (Charles River IMS) is designed to automate and simplify the institutional investment process across asset classes, from portfolio management and risk analytics through trading and post-trade settlement, with integrated compliance and managed data throughout. Charles River’s growing partner ecosystem enables clients to seamlessly access external data and analytics, applications and liquidity venues that support the unique demands of their product and asset class mix. Headquartered in Burlington, Massachusetts, we serve clients globally with more than 1,000 employees in 11 regional offices.

Statistics as of April 2020

NAME: pSemi
DESCRIPTION: pSemi Corporation is a Murata company driving semiconductor integration. pSemi builds on Peregrine Semiconductor’s 30-year legacy of technology advancements and strong IP portfolio but with a new mission—to enhance Murata’s world-class capabilities with high-performance semiconductors. With a strong foundation in RF integration, pSemi’s product portfolio now spans power management, connected sensors, antenna tuning and RF frontends. These intelligent and efficient semiconductors enable advanced modules for smartphones, base stations, personal computers, electric vehicles, data centers, IoT devices and healthcare. From headquarters in San Diego and offices around the world, pSemi’s team explores new ways to make electronics for the connected world smaller, thinner, faster and better.

NAME: Kabbage
DESCRIPTION:
Kabbage is a leading FinTech company changing the way small businesses solve cash-flow challenges. Fully automated and deeply connected with its 185,000+ customers, Kabbage provides access to funding in minutes, extends more than $10 million every day to small businesses, and powers borrowing experiences for some of the largest companies in the world.

While we've received numerous awards and recognition—such as Entrepreneur's Top Company Cultures, Inc Magazine's Top Private Companies, Glassdoor’s Best Places to Work, and Forbes FinTech 50—it is our people, our culture, and our leaders that make Kabbage such a great place to work.

NAME: Inspirato
DESCRIPTION: Inspirato is a leading luxury hospitality company that manages, staffs and maintains an exclusive collection of branded luxury vacation homes. Unlike Internet vacation rental brokers, we offer a carefully crafted experience delivering the luxury and service of a five-star hotel in the comfort of a spacious home. This includes investing in luxury furnishings, kitchen appliances, linens, and toiletries for every home, plus an expert service team and local on-site concierge to manage pre-arrival planning, daily housekeeping, and maintenance. With our unparalleled expertise in residential travel, we ensure the consistently luxurious experience that discerning travelers demand. For those who can’t imagine traveling any other way, our private club provides full access to the Inspirato Collection of 900+ vacation options, members-only rates, and valuable travel benefits. For more information on Inspirato, please visit www.inspirato.com.

NAME: Niantic
DESCRIPTION:
Originally formed at Google in 2011, we became an independent company with a strong group of investors including Nintendo, The Pokémon Company, and Alsop Louie Partners. Our current titles include pioneering global-control game Ingress, record-breaking AR game Pokémon GO, and recently released third title, Harry Potter: Wizards Unite.

We're a hard-working, fun, and exciting group who value intellectual curiosity and a passion for problem-solving. We have offices located in San Francisco, Sunnyvale, Bellevue, Los Angeles, Tokyo, Hamburg, and Zurich.

NAME:
Kaplan Test Prep
Part of Graham Holdings
DESCRIPTION:
In 1938 Stanley Kaplan started a small tutoring service which pioneered the entire test prep industry. Since our inception, we have worked hard to provide Kaplan employees with a dynamic and enthusiastic work environment. People here truly believe in what they do and this has led to the development of an innovative and team-oriented culture. The people of Kaplan is what ultimately makes the Kaplan work experience so exceptional.

When you work at Kaplan you experience the excitement and creativity of a start-up organization but with the fortitude and reliability of a Fortune 500 company. The success of our business has always been directly related to our ability to hire and retain talented and motivated professionals.
MISSION:
Mission: Kaplan helps individuals achieve their educational and career goals. We build futures one success story at a time.

Our core values--Integrity, Knowledge, Support, Opportunity, Support--define our company culture and provide the framework for what we deliver to our customers and employees each day.

NAME:
All Web Leads
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION: All Web Leads (AWL) was founded in 2005 and is the nation's premier Customer Acquisition Marketing business focused on the insurance industry. Our team delivers tens of thousands of high-intent, qualified consumers to our customers every day. At the heart of AWL’s business is a proprietary Customer Acquisition Marketing (CAM) technology and services platform that allows us to attract, engage and qualify prospective consumers. This platform is based on a “closed-loop” architecture that incorporates data, analytics and real-time automated decision-making to optimize performance across the entire consumer lifecycle. We help our customers -- insurance agents, brokers and carriers -- acquire more consumers to create increased profitably.
MISSION: Mission: Winning is a core mission here at AWL and the way you consistently win is to have a trusted and talented team of people working passionately toward their goals. Check us out. You will learn firsthand how we lead our industry by combining a passion for data and technology in -- what else -- a winning way."

NAME: Eventbrite
DESCRIPTION:
Eventbrite is a global self-service ticketing platform for live experiences that allows anyone to create, share, find and attend events that fuel their passions and enrich their lives. From music festivals, marathons, conferences, community rallies, and fundraisers, to gaming competitions and air guitar contests.
Learn more at www.eventbrite.com.

NAME: PrimePay
DESCRIPTION:
PrimePay, founded in 1986, is a payroll service and human capital management (HCM) provider, offering solutions that empower business to focus on what matters most. We deliver highly configurable HR and payroll solutions designed to create efficiencies and to maximize compliance for our clients across our nationwide presence.”

Our payroll & HCM solutions empower small business owners to easily manage their employees from hire to retire. And PrimePay employees are there every step of the way.

With over 30 offices nationwide, our goal is to take care of back-office tasks so our small businesses clients can get back to doing what they love. Whether that’s running their business and growing the local economy, or getting involved in their community, we exist to help business owners achieve their dreams.

The nitty gritty: PrimePay is an independent and privately-owned national company, serving all 50 states. PrimePay maintains our own proprietary SSAE 16 Type II Compliant technology solutions, ensuring our clients’ data is always safe.

NAME: GMR Marketing
DESCRIPTION:
GMR Marketing is an innovative global experiential and sponsorship leader that exists to create memories that matter.

By decoding human behavior, GMR designs experiences that enrich life's stories through shared passions, driving meaningful business results that change the way people, think, feel and behave.

GMR pioneered experiential marketing in 1979 and believes experience matters today more than ever. The agency creates, consults and activates in more than 70 countries, covering every continent from 23 offices in 12 countries. GMR is headquartered in the United States and is part of Omnicom Group, Inc.

NAME: Havas Health and You
DESCRIPTION: Havas Health & You is the healthcare and wellness arm of Paris-based Havas, a division of Vivendi. The NYC agencies under the HH&Y branding include Havas Life Metro and Havas Life+ (formerly Havas Lynx).

NAME:
All Web Leads
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION: All Web Leads (AWL) was founded in 2005 and is the nation's premier Customer Acquisition Marketing business focused on the insurance industry. Our team delivers tens of thousands of high-intent, qualified consumers to our customers every day. At the heart of AWL’s business is a proprietary Customer Acquisition Marketing (CAM) technology and services platform that allows us to attract, engage and qualify prospective consumers. This platform is based on a “closed-loop” architecture that incorporates data, analytics and real-time automated decision-making to optimize performance across the entire consumer lifecycle. We help our customers -- insurance agents, brokers and carriers -- acquire more consumers to create increased profitably.
MISSION: Mission: Winning is a core mission here at AWL and the way you consistently win is to have a trusted and talented team of people working passionately toward their goals. Check us out. You will learn firsthand how we lead our industry by combining a passion for data and technology in -- what else -- a winning way."

NAME: Atlantic Bay Mortgage Group
DESCRIPTION: Founded in 1997, Atlantic Bay Mortgage Group® is a privately owned national mortgage lender headquartered in Virginia Beach, Virginia with over 800 associates and is licensed in 23 states and growing. Atlantic Bay has helped over 130,000 families find the home of their dreams. Atlantic Bay has received several top recognitions including: Top 100 Mortgage Company in America, Best Mortgage Company, No. 1 Top Workplaces for Large Companies in Hampton Roads, Virginia and Charlotte, North Carolina, and Inc. 5000 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in America. Through its charitable arm, AB Cares, Atlantic Bay has donated more than $2 million to charities and participated in events that promote the passions of our customers, employees, and neighbors. AB Cares has forged a unique partnership with the non-profit Roc Solid Foundation, and works to build hope for families with children facing pediatric cancer.

NAME: Warby Parker
DESCRIPTION: Warby Parker is a transformative lifestyle brand offering designer eyewear at a revolutionary price while leading the way for socially-conscious businesses. By cutting out the middlemen and engaging directly with consumers, we're able to offer ultra-high-quality, vintage-inspired frames for $95 including shipping. There's a bigger picture, too: social innovation is woven into the DNA of the company, and for every pair of glasses purchased, a pair is distributed to someone in need.

NAME: Sierra Club
DESCRIPTION:
Sierra Club has grown to become America's largest grassroots environmental advocacy organization--and also one of its most effective. The Sierra Club promotes outdoor activities and environmental activism on both the local and national levels through political lobbying, education, outings, and publications. Sierra Club's has more than 2.6 million members and supporters, organized into state and regional chapters throughout the US and Canada. Sierra Club publishes books, calendars, Sierra Magazine, and numerous newsletters and digital content. Its current issues include moving beyond coal-fired power, promoting clean energy, stopping the worst of the natural gas boom, and expanding iconic landscapes across the U.S. The group was founded in 1892 by world renowned naturalist John Muir.

Working at the Sierra Club, no matter what your position, means that you are working to build a green, equitable, 100% clean energy future for generations to come.

NAME: Altec Industries
DESCRIPTION: Altec Industries is actually very little talk, but lots of action. Altec manufactures lift trucks, digger derricks, and specialty handling equipment used by electric utility, telecommunications, and forestry industries, and various government branches. After-sale services and parts are offered worldwide, as well. Altec's used equipment is sold through sister subsidiary National Utility Equipment Co., and rented through Global Rental Co., also in the Altec family. Altec offers financing, too, through Altec Capital Services. The equipment maker's production, assembly, and service facilities crisscross Canada and the US. Founded in 1929, Altec is owned and led by its founder's third generation, Lee Styslinger III.

NAME: Flatiron Health
DESCRIPTION: Flatiron Health is a healthcare technology and services company focused on accelerating cancer research and improving patient care. Our platform enables cancer researchers and care providers to learn from the experience of every patient. Currently, Flatiron partners with over 265 community cancer clinics, three major academic research centers and 13 out of the top 14 therapeutic oncology companies. Flatiron is backed by Google Ventures, First Round Capital, Roche and others.

NAME:
Nespresso USA
Part of Nestlé
DESCRIPTION: The NESPRESSO Story Our story began over 32 years ago with a simple but revolutionary idea – to create the perfect cup of coffee. An industry pioneer, Nestlé Nespresso USA has become an international reference for the highest quality coffee and an iconic symbol of refined elegance. We are now in 69 countries and our team has grown well beyond 12,000 employees. We are part of Nestlé SA in Switzerland, the world's largest food company. Nespresso continues to drive momentum and innovation in our market segment, and in North America, we're just getting started.
MISSION: Mission: Our singular focus is on delivering highest quality coffees and ultimate coffee experiences to our consumers cup after cup. We compete in both the business-to-consumer and business-to-business segments, allowing consumers to enjoy our highest quality coffees at home and to recreate these perfect coffee moments wherever they may be.

NAME:
Xtreme Consulting
Acquired by DISYS
DESCRIPTION: Xtreme Consulting has become one of the fastest growing IT consulting and talent management firms in the United States. Headquartered in Kirkland, WA, Xtreme has grown from a small start-up to a business that, today, employs nearly 700 consultants across the U.S., Canada, and internationally. The firm supports leaders of organizations by gathering best-in-class expertise and matching exceptional people with opportunities to accelerate clients’ success. Service offerings include business and technology consulting, staff augmentation, and managed solutions.

NAME:
UserTesting
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION: We're a pre-IPO company located in San Francisco, Edinburgh and Atlanta. We make it easy for businesses to understand how customers interact with their digital properties so that they can improve their customer experience. We do this by giving companies on-demand access to people in their exact target market who deliver video, audio, and written feedback on websites, mobile apps, and prototypes. Over 34,000 companies, including Google, Facebook, CBS, Apple, and The Home Depot use UserTesting to improve their user experience—and their bottom line.

NAME: ChannelAdvisor
DESCRIPTION: ChannelAdvisor (NYSE: ECOM) is a leading e-commerce cloud platform whose mission is to connect and optimize the world’s commerce. For nearly two decades, ChannelAdvisor has helped brands and retailers worldwide improve their online performance by expanding sales channels, connecting with consumers around the world, optimizing their operations for peak performance and providing actionable analytics to improve competitiveness. Thousands of customers depend on ChannelAdvisor to securely power their sales and optimize fulfillment on channels such as Amazon, eBay, Google, Facebook, Walmart and hundreds more. For more information, visit www.channeladvisor.com.

NAME: Aya Healthcare
DESCRIPTION:
Aya Healthcare offers a collaborative, welcoming, casual and high-energy environment. We often hear that working at Aya feels like working with family, and we encourage that sentiment with frequent social activities in and outside of work. A casual dress code means employees come to work feeling comfortable and ready to do their best work.

Employees’ hard work never goes unnoticed and there is a plethora of opportunities for career advancement within the organization. Because we’re growing so rapidly, it’s common to be promoted within the first year – or even the first few months! Aya also provides incentive trips to encourage employees to meet ambitious goals and so they can get to know their colleagues.

Along with flexible hours and remote options, Aya encourages work-life balance and truly cares about the wellbeing of employees. The company takes feedback seriously when implementing changes or making decisions and continually looks for ways to improve to ensure employees enjoy coming to work every day.

Ultimately, what really matters is that everyone at Aya believes in what we’re doing as a company and how we’re effecting change within healthcare. Employees understand that we do the right thing because it’s the right thing to do. That people come first. That we put care, compassion and heart before profit. None of our perks overshadow the fact that our employees are passionate about our mission and the work we do and feel empowered and excited to make their mark within Aya, patient care and the general healthcare landscape.

NAME: Trupanion
DESCRIPTION: Trupanion is a leading provider of medical insurance for cats and dogs. We are helping pet owners afford unexpected veterinary costs while also helping the veterinary community practice the best medicine. We are headquartered in the Georgetown neighborhood of Seattle and serve families in Canada, the United States, and Puerto Rico.

NAME: Southern Health Partners
DESCRIPTION:
Southern Health Partners is a leading provider of healthcare services to county and city correctional facilities! As the pioneer over twenty-five years ago, we continue to be the leader in customized inmate medical solutions. We currently contract with more than 250 facilities in 14 states.

Our medical, dental, and mental health services are tailored to the needs of each jail facility. In addition to improved quality of care and cost savings, we greatly reduce risk through tight controls and by providing insurance liability coverage for our program.

NAME: Phreesia
DESCRIPTION:
Phreesia helps medical groups and health systems successfully manage patient intake. When we founded Phreesia in 2005, we saw an opportunity to put innovative technology into the hands of patients to automate check-in and streamline front-office workflow. Over the last decade, our platform has evolved as we incorporated eligibility and benefits verification, built our own payments platform and integrated with leading practice management and electronic medical record systems. Today, we manage intake for over 50 million patients annually. Since our founding, we have checked in more than 15% of the U.S. population.

Headquartered in New York City and offices located in Ottawa, Canada and Raleigh, NC, Phreesia has grown to over 400 employees.
MISSION: Mission: We have made it our mission to know patient intake and to help healthcare providers better understand their patients. We use medical histories, insurance benefits, socio-economic indicators—whatever it takes—to gather important data and engage patients in their care. Whether we are screening for depression, identifying patients at risk for falls or signing up women for mammograms, we want to make a difference. Phreesia is a technology company, but our goal is to improve healthcare.

NAME: Toptal
DESCRIPTION:
The World's Top Talent, On Demand™

Toptal is an elite network of the world's top talent in business, design, and technology, on demand. With over 500 individuals in over 60 countries helping operate our core business, Toptal is the largest fully-distributed, highly-skilled global workforce. Our vision is to be the greatest talent company in the world, connecting the world's top talent with the world's top organizations for their most important business challenges.
MISSION: Mission: While we’re primarily focused on bringing quality and value to our clients, we’re also committed to creating a world-class environment for our employees. We are a completely distributed company with thousands of core and network team members located all over the world, and we take the best elements of virtual teams and combine them with a support structure that encourages innovation, social interaction, and fun.

NAME:
WeddingWire
Part of The Knot Worldwide
DESCRIPTION: N/A

NAME:
Sun West Mortgage
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION:
Sun West Mortgage Company, Inc. (www.swmc.com) is a full service, mortgage banker established in 1980. Our excellent service and fast turn times have made Sun West a multi-billion dollar national originator. As a result, Sun West is a leader in offering a diverse set of products at excellent pricing. Sun West is a HUD approved mortgagee (FHA & HECM), VA LAPP approved, USDA lender, Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac Seller/Servicer, and Ginnie Mae Issuer. Sun West is a national leader in HMBS, residential, and commercial securitization.
Sun West is well recognized for its stability, capitalization, and technological superiority. We are growing rapidly in this unique market and we are inviting top-notch professionals to participate in our success.

NAME:
OPNET
Acquired by Riverbed Technology
DESCRIPTION: N/A

NAME: TechTarget
DESCRIPTION:
TechTarget (Nasdaq: TTGT) is the global leader in purchase intent-driven marketing and sales services that deliver business impact for enterprise technology companies. With high-quality editorial content across more than 150 highly targeted technology-specific websites, TechTarget attracts technology buyers researching companies’ information technology needs. By understanding tech buyer content consumption, TechTarget creates the purchase intent insights that fuel effective marketing and sales activities for clients around the world.

TechTarget has offices in Boston, London, Munich, Paris, San Francisco, Singapore, and Sydney. For more information, visit techtarget.com and follow us on Twitter @TechTarget.

NAME: The Richards Group
DESCRIPTION: For The Richards Group every day is brand new. The independent advertising agency specializes in creating loyalty for its customers' brands through marketing, public relations, and sales promotions. Services include creating company or product names and inventing corporate identities, as well as graphic design, packaging, analytics, digital marketing, and marketing for certain niches, including sports, entertainment, and minorities. Founded by Stan Richards in 1965, the group builds brand awareness through everything from print ads to employee uniform design. It has molded the public's perception of such brands as Amstel Light, Fruit of the Loom, GameStop, Motel 6, The Home Depot, and Red Lobster.

NAME: Cambridge Associates, LLC
DESCRIPTION:
We are a leading global investment firm that delivers innovative portfolio management services to institutional and private investors. For more than 40 years, we have focused on discovering new ways to add long-term value to our clients’ portfolios based on their unique objectives.

We have built a global network of outstanding investment advisors and an extensive research platform to support them. With more than 1,100 employees around the globe, including investment and research staff on four continents, we are constantly looking to discover best-in-class ideas for our clients’ portfolios.

We have staff in eight cities globally including four in the United States (Boston, Dallas, Menlo Park, and Arlington, VA), as well as Beijing, London, Singapore and Sydney. We select our colleagues with great attention to their potential to become a valuable member of a collegial, intelligent and hard-working team.
MISSION: Mission: Our clients trust the experience, leadership, and integrity of our investment professionals. Working with some of the world’s most sophisticated institutional investors for more than 40 years, we bring a deep knowledge of portfolio management best practices to the clients we serve. Our commitment to independence helps to ensure that the advice we give our clients is solely based on what is best for their portfolios.

NAME: SmartBear
DESCRIPTION:
All software shares a need: quality. Whether it's writing code, finding bugs, or simply letting teams work better together, our tools are designed to help software teams keep up with it. For a world in constant flux, it’s a must.

That’s where we come in. We’re behind the software that powers thousands of companies – some of which are the most innovative in the world. And you can help us.

NAME: Via Transportation
DESCRIPTION: Simply put: we design intelligent systems that take people where they need to go. Our sophisticated routing technology pairs people traveling the same direction into shared vehicles, reducing traffic congestion and saving riders money. We’ve provided 70+ million rides around the world (and counting) while saving 32+ million pounds of CO2. That’s a whole lot of good for people and the planet, and we’re just getting started.
MISSION: Mission: Just as no two communities are alike, there’s not a one-size-fits-all solution to public transportation. By designing localized, customizable solutions for each and every partner, we’re championing the evolution of cities around the world. This means working closely with public agencies to integrate our platform across rural towns and urban areas, supporting bus and rail operators by tailoring solutions to improve ride access and reliability, and offering university and corporations a means of movement that eliminates commuting worries and maximizes productivity.

NAME:
Room & Board
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION:
Our collaborative spirit leaves little room for bureaucracy and cumbersome rules. Instead we keep it simple, take accountability, solve problems and ultimately do the right thing. We believe in each other.

Room & Board is a privately held, national retailer of modern home furnishings based in Minneapolis, Minnesota with locations across the country. Since 1980, we’ve been providing extraordinary experiences for our customers as we help them create homes they love. We create exclusive contemporary designs and believe expertly crafted American-made furniture offers the best value in terms of quality, design longevity and environmental sustainability.

We seamlessly serve our customers through 19 retail locations, a robust e-commerce site, Business Interiors channel and Customer Care support. Join us and love what you do. It makes for a great day at work. Visit roomandboard.com/careers for more information.
MISSION:
Mission: Our goal is to provide beautiful products, value and exceptional service to our customers. We are equally passionate about creating a respectful and inspiring workplace for our staff members.

We are proud to have been recognized by the Minneapolis / St. Paul Business Journal as one of its 2019 Best Places to Work.

NAME: TalentBurst
DESCRIPTION:
TalentBurst is an award winning staffing and high hazard payroll firm, headquartered in Boston with branch offices in San Francisco, Fort Lauderdale, Dallas, Toronto and Gurgaon. Our clients include leading social media, technology, financial technology, banks, utilities, pharma and biotech companies. We are a 10 time INC 500/5000 company and have received numerous industry awards from GRI, PROUnlimited, ZeroChaos among others.

TalentBurst works with over 100 of the Fortune 1000 companies. Our recruiting teams are amongst the most successful in the industry. We have a strong reputation for treating our employees right and helping you find your next dream employer.

Our management team has an average of 20 years industry experience within the human capital management industry.
MISSION:
Mission: Our mission:
- Provide customers with process-based staffing services that fulfill their project based needs and provide unparalleled value
- Inspire personal and professional growth in our employees through innovation, creativity and a personal touch
- Create the ideal work environment for our internal staff and consultants
- Help each employee achieve their career objectives
- Follow a strict code of corporate ethics
- Fair and balanced decision making
- Respect for each employee
- Reward excellence

NAME: CALIBRE Systems
DESCRIPTION: Founded in 1989, CALIBRE, an employee-owned management consulting and digital transformation solutions company, delivers enduring solutions to Defense, Federal, and commercial clients to solve management, technology, and program challenges in the areas of enterprise information management; facility and land management; finance, logistics, and cost management; and training and education.

NAME: Mesirow Financial
DESCRIPTION: Mesirow is an independent, employee-owned firm founded in 1937. As specialists in investment, risk management and advisory services, we are committed to helping our institutional, corporate and individual clients achieve their objectives. Our professionals are inspired by an entrepreneurial desire to develop tailored solutions designed to deliver measurable results. To learn more, please visit mesirowfinancial.com.

NAME: Landmark Properties
DESCRIPTION: Landmark Properties is a fully integrated real estate firm specializing in the development and management of high quality student housing communities. Backed by a deep understanding of the markets, a commitment to quality and a strong track record of success, Landmark is responsible for some of the premier student housing communities in the nation.

NAME: University of West Georgia
DESCRIPTION: Go West, young men and women, and join the 10,000 students who attend University of West Georgia (UWG). UWG students can major in some 110 areas through the university's schools and colleges (Arts and Sciences, Business, Education, and the Graduate School). UWG also allows select high school students to earn both college and high school credits simultaneously. UWG also offers a full program of distance education via the Internet through its eCore program. The school was founded in 1906 as the Fourth District Agricultural and Mechanical School in Carrolton, Georgia. The school became State University of West Georgia in 1996; it dropped "State" from its name in 2005.

NAME:
SpotX
Acquired by RTL Group
DESCRIPTION: SpotX is a privately-held global video ad serving platform providing premium digital media owners with a holistic solution that allow them to monetize their content with video advertising across desktop, mobile and connected devices. SpotX’s platform features modern ad serving, programmatic infrastructure and other monetization tools, including solutions for OTT and outstream video ad units.
MISSION:
Mission: SpotX is a vibrant global company filled with talented and collaborative teammates who are always pushing one another to beat their personal best.

We foster a tech culture with a focus on innovation, always encouraging members of the team to contribute new ideas. We are always assessing our priorities and adapting to ensure we’re focused on the right projects to stay ahead in this fast-paced industry.

Above all, SpotXers are team-oriented and always willing to step up to get something done. There is never a dull moment—each day brings new challenges that motivate us to stay focused and passionate about the work we do.

NAME:
Intralinks
Part of SS&C
DESCRIPTION:
SS&C Intralinks is the leading provider of technology-enabled services for the global banking, dealmaking and capital markets industries. Every day, thousands of financial professionals from our six-million-strong user community around the world log on to the Intralinks platform to conduct strategic initiatives like mergers and acquisitions, private equity management, corporate lending, debt sales, capital raising and investor reporting. We’ve hosted more than $35 trillion in transaction volume and we count among our clients more than 99% of the Fortune 1000.

By delivering unparalleled technology-based services, we help businesses in every sector and region to be more productive, more efficient and more successful – to drive transactions of the size and kind that power commerce, move markets and transform economies.
MISSION: Mission: SS&C Intralinks focuses on enabling and securing the flow of information for high-value transactions and delivering insights to the world’s largest companies. Intralinks pioneered the virtual data room and revolutionized the financial technology services industry, and our team has continued to lead the fintech transformation in a solid, unbroken line for a quarter of a century.

NAME:
FanDuel
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION: FanDuel Group is an innovative sports-tech entertainment company that is changing the way consumers engage with their favorite sports, teams, and leagues. The premier gaming destination in the United States, FanDuel Group consists of a portfolio of leading brands across gaming, sports betting, daily fantasy sports, advance-deposit wagering, and TV/media, including FanDuel, Betfair US, DRAFT, and TVG. FanDuel Group has a presence across 45 states and 8 million customers. The company is based in New York with offices in California, New Jersey, Florida, Oregon, and Scotland. FanDuel Group is a subsidiary of Paddy Power Betfair plc, a leading international sports betting and gaming operator and a constituent of the FTSE 100 index of the London Stock Exchange.

By combining industry-leading software and a full suite of professional services, PlanSource provides companies of all sizes with a complete solution for benefits shopping, enrollment, billing, compliance and administration. Learn more at www.plansource.com.

Mansfield Energy
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION:
Serving North America's leading companies, organizations, and governments, Mansfield Energy provides innovative solutions to the most demanding energy procurement, supply and logistics challenges. Offering a broad range of solutions including fuels, natural gas, data management tools and price risk management services, Mansfield Energy delivers over 3 billion gallons of fuel and complementary products annually to 8,000 customers across the U.S. and Canada. Mansfield Energy is headquartered in Georgia and operates in every U.S. state and Canadian province. For more information about Mansfield, call 800-695-6626 or visit our website at www.mansfield.energy.

EOE/Minorities/Females/Vets/Disabled
MISSION:
Mission: We are proud to be a privately held company with second-generation leadership at the helm. Our mission is to Build Relationships that Matter. We value our long-lasting relationships with customers, suppliers, and vendors and we continually strive to earn and maintain these trusted relationships.

Mansfield's Vision is to shape the future of energy distribution. We have the ideas, the resources, and the goodwill of our stakeholders. The energy marketplace is far from perfect; through our efforts, it can be both challenged and improved.

Mansfield has 6 Core Principles that our employees exemplify each day:
• Personal Service
• Integrity
• Conscientiousness
• Teamwork
• Innovation
• Excellence

NAME: Turbonomic
DESCRIPTION: Turbonomic AI-powered Application Resource Management (ARM) simultaneously optimizes application performance, compliance and cost in real-time. The software platform automatically identifies and executes the right actions at the right time at every layer of the application stack. Applications get the exact resources they need, continuously and in real-time. Turbonomic has a global network of over 400 partners and technology alliances with industry leaders AWS, Cisco, DXC and Microsoft, among others. Turbonomic is trusted by the world’s largest organizations running the most complex and dynamic applications, including more than 100 of the Fortune 500. One of the fastest-growing privately held software companies, Boston-based Turbonomic is backed by leading venture firms including Bain Capital Ventures, General Atlantic, Globespan Capital Partners, Highland Capital Partners, Iconiq Capital and Trend Forward Capital.
MISSION: Mission: Our mission is to transform the way IT infrastructure is managed by enabling workload automation for hybrid cloud environments across the globe. At the core of our mission we have a growing team of dedicated, highly driven and passionate employees, strong channel partnerships and superior technology that the market is demanding.

NAME: Ruffalo Noel Levitz
DESCRIPTION:
Ruffalo Noel Levitz (RNL) is the leading provider of higher education enrollment, student success, and fundraising solutions. More than 1,900 colleges, universities, and nonprofit organizations rely on RNL for advanced analytics, personalized engagement, and industry-leading insights to achieve their missions. The firm is focused on the entire life cycle of enrollment and fundraising.

With more than 60 years of experience and long-standing client relationships, Ruffalo Noel Levitz serves as a trusted partner to institutions and other non-profits around the world ranging from small private liberal arts colleges to large state universities.

At RNL you have the opportunity to be your best every day. You’ll work with motivated, talented colleagues and clients and you will have the opportunity to form exceptional partnerships while you achieve strong results for our clients and for our company.

NAME: RoundPoint Mortgage Servicing
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in 2007, RoundPoint delivers innovative solutions for managing an array of residential mortgages. The Fort Mill, SC-based company leverages its wealth of experience in managing highly complex servicing relationships to provide superior value to its diverse client base, which includes international and regional banks, credit unions, private equity firms, and hedge funds. RoundPoint is dedicated to providing best-in-class customer service to its homeowners and institutional clients.

RoundPoint actively purchases mortgage servicing rights (MSR) from sellers of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac loans and Ginnie Mae securities. RoundPoint also offers an array of subservicing options that can be customized to meet individual investor needs for both Agency and Non-Agency portfolios. RoundPoint offers originators the option to sell MSRs through traditional co-issue relationships as well as Fannie Mae’s Bifurcation Program. Our customizable subservicing options include Agency and Non-Agency subservicing and Special Servicing of distressed or credit-sensitive assets. Our multifaceted approach is designed to build collaborative relationships and provide an unmatched level of service for investors and business partners.

RoundPoint is licensed to service loans in all fifty states, the District of Columbia, and the U.S Virgin Islands and is publicly rated by Fitch Ratings (RPS3+, RSS3+) and Standard & Poor’s (Average). As an approved Ginnie Mae, Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, FHA, and VA servicer, the company has market-leading expertise servicing loans in accordance with agency guidelines and managing the complex servicing requirements of loans involved in both FDIC loss share and structured loan sale transactions.

NMLS ID # 18188
RoundPoint supports Equal Housing Opportunity

NAME:
Systems Planning and Analysis, Inc.
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION: Systems Planning and Analysis, Inc. (SPA) has a passion for doing interesting work that impacts important decisions. We are a professional services provider with a long-standing reputation for unrivaled technical and analytical support to executive decision makers throughout the Departments of Defense, Homeland Security and Energy.

NAME: High Point University
DESCRIPTION:
HPU is a private comprehensive institution, rooted in the liberal arts, with 4,573 undergraduate and graduate students from 45 states and 43 countries. High Point University currently offers 42 undergraduate majors, 51 undergraduate minors and 12 graduate degree programs, including a doctoral program in educational leadership and two more doctoral programs proposed for 2017.

High Point University is committed to academic excellence. Students are mentored by caring faculty who are actively involved in teaching and scholarly research. HPU’s signature experiential learning program differentiates this collegiate experience from others, and reinforces what is taught in the classroom while providing students with resources for professional networking and deep, practical knowledge of their fields.

The High Point University Panthers compete in 16 NCAA Div. I sports and are members of the Big South Conference. HPU also provides 32 club sports and more than 100 student clubs and organizations.

NAME: HighRadius
DESCRIPTION: HighRadius is a Fintech enterprise Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. The HighRadius™ Integrated Receivables platform optimizes cash flow through automation of receivables and payments processes across credit, collections, cash application, deductions, electronic billing and payment processing. Powered by the Rivana™ Artificial Intelligence Engine, HighRadius™ Integrated Receivables enables teams to leverage machine learning for accurate decision making and future outcomes. The RadiusOne™ B2B payment network allows suppliers to digitally connect with buyers, closing the loop from supplier receivable processes to buyer payable processes. HighRadius solutions have a proven track record of optimizing cash flow, reducing days sales outstanding (DSO) and bad debt, and increasing operational efficiency so that companies may achieve strong ROI in just a few months.

DESCRIPTION:

NAME:
Nevro
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION:
Nevro (NYSE: NVRO) is a global medical device company headquartered in Redwood City, California. We are focused on providing innovative products that improve the quality of life of patients suffering from debilitating chronic pain.

We started with a simple mission to help more patients suffering from chronic pain. At each stage of development, our research was subject to the highest levels of scientific rigor, resulting in a new therapy that has impacted the lives of over 55,000 patients around the world.

Nevro has developed and commercialized the Senza spinal cord stimulation (SCS) system, an evidence-based, non-pharmacologic neuromodulation platform for the treatment of chronic pain. HF10 therapy has demonstrated the ability to reduce or eliminate opioids in ≥65% of patients across six peer-reviewed clinical studies. The Senza® System, Senza II™ System, and the Senza® Omnia™ System are the only SCS systems that deliver Nevro's proprietary HF10® therapy.

NAME:
NewDay USA
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION:
NewDay USA is a nationwide VA mortgage lender focused on helping active military personnel, veterans, and their families achieve their financial and housing goals. NewDay USA is also a Ginnie Mae (GNMA) approved issuer/servicer. The company employs best practices in mortgage lending and career growth for mortgage professionals. Consistent with its mission, NewDay is a philanthropic partner of numerous organizations focused on assisting military veterans and their families in need. The NewDay USA Foundation contributes 5% of its net income to countless military-friendly organizations, including the GWOT-Foundation, USO, Military Bowl and an endowed scholarship for veterans at University of Maryland through TerpVets. The company’s foundation has awarded over $2M in 60 full, four-year military school scholarships to children of killed or disabled service members. Its employees volunteer thousands of hours annually, from serving the homeless at Baltimore Station to hands-on Vietnam and Korean War Memorial cleanup.

NewDay USA is a registered trade name of New Day Financial, LLC (NMLS # 1043), which is a key holding of Chrysalis Holdings, LLC, a premier private investment company focused on the financial services industry. For more information about NewDay USA, visit www.newdayusa.com.

NAME: Trinity Consultants
DESCRIPTION: Founded in 1974, Trinity Consultants is an EHS, engineering & science consulting company with offices across the U.S. and in Canada, the U.K., Ireland, Australia, and China. We help organizations address complex, mission-critical business objectives through a combination of consulting, technology, training, and staffing services. Trinity is particularly well known with respect to environmental permitting and compliance (most notably, industrial air quality issues). EHS digital solutions, and sustainability. Organic growth and acquisitions have enabled the firm to expand into health and safety, process engineering, and complex facility design. Client sectors include energy, manufacturing, and commercial/institutional. We also provide a variety of scientific and engineering-based services to the pharma/bio-pharma (life sciences) industries. Trinity also markets BREEZE environmental modeling software and a wide range of professional training programs in EHS topics.

NAME: Conservation International
DESCRIPTION: Conservation International (CI) has been protecting nature for the benefit of all for over 30 years. Through science, policy, and partnerships, CI is helping build a healthier, more prosperous and more productive planet. CI’s work is moving entire societies toward a healthier, more sustainable development path. Over the years, CI has helped support 1,200 protected areas and interventions across 77 countries, safeguarding more than 601 million hectares of land, marine and coastal areas. Founded in 1987, CI employs over 1,000 people and works with more than 2,000 partners in 30+ countries.

NAME: CFA Institute
DESCRIPTION:
CFA Institute is the world’s largest association of investment management professionals. Our global community of more than 135,000 members and 145+ member societies is dedicated to upholding the highest educational, ethical, and professional standards in the investment industry for the ultimate benefit of society.

Over 600 employees across seven international offices are our most important assets for achieving our mission to lead the investment management profession globally. The CFA Institute benefits package offers employees and their families an array of programs designed to promote and protect good health, encourage career growth, and plan for a financially secure retirement. We are a world-class employer.

NAME: Milbank LLP
DESCRIPTION: "Follow the money" could be the motto for the Manhattan law firm of Milbank, Tweed, Hadley & McCloy. Since 1866, the firm has represented clients such as the Rockefellers, the American Cancer Society, and JPMorgan Chase. Today with hundreds of attorneys, the firm's practice areas include intellectual property, bankruptcy, private equity, reinsurance and insurance, financial restructuring, and compensation and benefits. Milbank's reach extends well beyond the US; it has a strong international presence, with almost a dozen offices located in Brazil, China, Germany, Singapore, Japan, and the UK.

NAME:
Main Street Renewal
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION:
Main Street Renewal is a private company focused on buying, renovating, and leasing homes across the country. We are proudly based in Austin, TX and have branches in 22 cities, with more coming soon! We hire dedicated, caring professionals, who are focused on our customers. Our goal is to provide our residents a great house, easy lease experience, and attentive service so they can create a home they love.

Why do our residents choose Main Street Renewal? We use a unique model to locate excellent properties and upgrade them to the Main Street Renewal standard. Our upgrades include earth friendly zero VOC paint, energy efficient fluorescent light bulbs, faux wood blinds, and stain resistant carpet. Most of our homes also include updates such as stainless steel kitchen appliances and granite counter-tops. We also make a strong effort to work with local vendors in order to help support local job markets and economies.
MISSION:
Mission: Our Commitment to our Customers: We provide our residents a great house, easy lease experience, and attentive service so they can create a home they love.

Our Promise to our Teammates: We strive to hire caring, trustworthy, action-oriented teammates; provide our teammates with tools and training to become experts at their craft; empower and trust each team member to deliver great outcomes.

NAME:
Ontrak
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION: Ontrak, Inc. helps people with behavioral health conditions that result in serious medical issues. We use advanced analytics to find people in need, and connect with them on their terms. We treat them in a holistic, evidence-based program that includes nurse-led care coaching, face-to-face community-based resources, and behavioral health care. Through the OnTrak program, these people become healthier, resilient and strong. Leading health plans contract with us to help their members regain control of their health and their lives.
MISSION:
Mission: Our mission is to improve the health and save the lives of as many people as possible.

Our mission is driven by our company values and the diligent effort of our team. At Ontrak, Inc. we continually strive for excellence in serving our members, partnering with our clients and providers and working with our team.

NAME:
Build.com
Part of Ferguson Enterprises
DESCRIPTION:
Build.com lives at the intersection of two of the most interesting areas of business today - technology & home improvement. In fact, we’re the world’s largest online-only home improvement company. Our network of stores carries more than a million of the best-quality products in the latest styles, but that’s just part of our story. We’re able to compete against the biggest names in the industry because we’re constantly innovating & are committed to providing unparalleled customer service.

Our forward-thinking philosophy extends beyond our websites, and we’re very proud of the unique work environment we’ve created. Build.com promotes an open culture because we know great ideas come from anywhere. We’re looking for people who share our passion for innovation; people who think big & aren’t afraid to take risks. We believe in rewarding hard work & initiative. We know that our success is dependent on our team. If you’re passionate, inventive, creative, & genuine, then you’ll love Build.com.
MISSION:
Mission: Build.com empowers consumers and professionals to easily create beautiful and unique homes. We do this by offering over a million upscale, high-quality products and having a friendly, knowledgeable team who can answer almost any question seven days a week.

Our Vision:
To simplify the complexity of home improvement projects and provide a complete solution from inspiration to installation.

Covering a broad range of needs, our solutions include EMV chip, mag stripe, RFID, dual interface, metal, personalization, packaging, fulfillment, instant issuance, digital payment services, and more.

DESCRIPTION: The Berkshire Hathaway Homestate Companies (BHHC) is a group of six insurance companies that are part of the Berkshire Hathaway Insurance Group. NAME:
Glu Mobile
Hiring Surge
DESCRIPTION:
Glu is headquartered in San Francisco, with development studio in San Mateo, CA and a global presence extending to Toronto and Hyderabad, combining for just over 600 employees.

Our studios are hiring bright, hungry, innovative developers who are psyched about the surging mobile game development industry. Studio roles include Designers, Product Managers, Engineers, Data Analysts, Artists, QA, and Producers.

NAME: Alto Pharmacy
DESCRIPTION: Alto is a telehealth pharmacy focused on helping people live healthier by making the prescription experience easier, more supportive, and more affordable. We’re transforming a $500 billion industry by reinventing what a pharmacy can do, for both patients and providers—from hand-delivering medications for free to offering on-call help by text or chat. Over one million deliveries, over a thousand five-star Yelp reviews, and an NPS score of +86 later, we’re proud to say we’ve built a pharmacy that people truly love.

NAME: Momentum Solar
DESCRIPTION:
Momentum Solar is a premier residential solar provider with offices throughout the U.S. Founded in 2009, Momentum has grown exponentially over the past decade. We implement the entire solar process to ensure a seamless transition to renewable energy.

We bring clean, affordable energy to qualified homeowners by handling the entire process from solar enrollment through customized system design, permitting, engineering, installation, and activation of each system.

NAME: Carta
DESCRIPTION:
At Carta we create owners and make private markets liquid.

We live in a world where some people live on the equity stack and enjoy exponential wealth growth and preferential tax treatment; others live on the debt stack and may work their entire lives for a company and retire only with the cash they’ve managed to save from their paychecks. Our contribution to solving the wealth inequality problem is moving people from the debt stack (payroll) to the equity stack. By making it as easy to issue equity to employees as it is to put them on payroll, we can create more owners.

At Carta, we are helpful, transparent, fair, and kind. We are relentless executors, unconventional thinkers, and masters of our craft.

To learn more, here is what one of our investors wrote about leading our Series F.

Come join us in our mission to create more owners! https://carta.com/careers

NAME:
Reebok
Part of adidas
DESCRIPTION:
Boston is the Headquarter of Reebok and we have a deep fitness heritage and the mission to design and create the best gear and experiences for the sport of fitness and for fitness athletes around the globe. One brand unified under one logo – the Vector! And we now sport the largest color, animated sign in Boston.

Additional Resources:
Career Page: reebok.com/careers
Brand Page: https://www.adidas-group.com/en/brands/reebok/
New Stream: https://news.reebok.com/global

Mission: At Reebok, our mission is to be the Best Fitness Brand in the World. We live at the intersection of fitness and fashion; our product is a reflection of that connection. We know greatness doesn’t come from standing still and we have a long history of pushing boundaries and being daring in everything we do.

As we’ve transitioned from a traditional sports brand to a brand focused on fitness, we have come to understand one universal truth: That living an active life enables people to be their best selves – physically, mentally and socially.

At Reebok, we believe that through sport, we have the power to change lives. And our sport is fitness.

NAME: USTA
DESCRIPTION: You might say this sports group makes quite a racquet on the court. The United States Tennis Association (USTA) serves as the governing body for the sport of tennis in the US. It sets the rules of play and develops and promotes the sport at the local and professional levels. USTA also owns and operates the US Open, the annual Grand Slam event held at Arthur Ashe Stadium in Flushing Meadows, New York. In addition, the not-for-profit organization selects players to compete in such tournaments as the Davis Cup, the Fed Cup, and the Olympics. Founded in 1881 as the United States National Lawn Tennis Association, the USTA has grown to more than 700,000 members from all age and skill levels.

NAME: Datasite
DESCRIPTION:
Datasite is a leading global SaaS provider for participants in the M&A lifecycle. The company’s flagship platform, Datasite, powers secure, intelligent due diligence and enterprise collaboration for thousands of deals in more than 170 countries.

In 2018, Datasite completed its transformation from a 50-year old financial print company to a leading M&A SaaS technology company.

Today, with 25 locations across 13 countries, Datasite is perfectly positioned to help its clients in the M&A space, starting with due diligence and moving across the M&A life cycle.

NAME:
Amobee
Hiring Surge
Part of Singtel
DESCRIPTION:
The world’s leading independent advertising platform, Amobee empowers brands, agencies and broadcasters with advertising solutions for the converging world. Amobee’s platform provides end-to-end campaign planning, management and optimization across TV, digital and social media. Through the application of prescriptive AI, proprietary data and advanced analytics, advertisers can now seamlessly orchestrate the consumer journey across converged media and all devices, and eliminate the media overlap and waste which come from traditional media silos.

Amobee is a wholly owned subsidiary of Singtel, one of the largest communications technology companies in the world, which reaches more than 675 million mobile subscribers. The company operates across North America, Europe, Middle East, Asia and Australia.

NAME: Intouch Solutions
DESCRIPTION:
We understand you. Now you should know us.

At Intouch Solutions, we know pharma marketing isn't easy. But after more than a decade of hard work in this and similarly regulated industries, we think we understand that better than most. We have a pretty good idea of what it takes to connect your customers to your brand.

The question is, what — aside from our sparkling personality — do we bring to the table? How about:
»20+ years of pharma experience

You can't think 'outside the box' until you know what's going on inside the box.

Our Kansas City, Chicago, New York City, and London professionals take pride in working closely with each client in order to meet the needs of their brands, and we’re successful because we get results. Our clients turn to us because they know they’ll receive high-quality, cost-effective solutions to their marketing and technical challenges.

NAME:
Ameripark
Part of Citizens Parking
DESCRIPTION:
AmeriPark is a member of the industry's most diverse family of parking brands. Organized in 2013, Citizens Parking is the leader in Branded Parking Services, with 5 brands, 8,000 associates and 1,200 locations. The company has harnessed the power of our brands, leveraging a collaborative culture to seize and capitalize on parking’s greatest opportunities.

The AmeriPark brand has been expanding its award-winning customer service platform across the country for over 30 years combining creativity, operational excellence and financial discipline. Today AmeriPark proudly operates more than 250 properties in over 20 states and territories.
MISSION:

What we do is more than a job, it’s our passion. We empower each other. We inspire our clients. We encourage our community.

INTERGRITY & TRUST
