NAME:
Oxford Global Resources
Part of ASGN Incorporated
DESCRIPTION:
At Oxford Global Resources, we believe top talent is the catalyst for progress and that organizations should always be connected to the expertise they need. Having a network of professionals with in-demand skill sets allows Oxford to provide our clients with immediate access to subject matter experts, so they can quickly build an entire team or augment internal resources.

Our network comes from consistently building relationships with skilled professionals in the industries we serve, including information technology, engineering, life sciences, and healthcare technology.

Just as we focus on helping organizations and consultants succeed, we also work to ensure our sales, recruitment, and corporate employees thrive in a challenging and rewarding environment. Oxford is built on the entrepreneurial spirit of our staff, which fosters a results-driven, team-supported culture where employees can develop their talents and grow in their careers.

Connect with us today at careers.oxfordcorp.com

NAME: BNSF Logistics
DESCRIPTION:
BNSF Logistics is a technology and people-driven third-party logistics company that delivers what matters – to our people, our customers, our carriers, and our communities. We are a growing company that dares to embrace imagination and combine it with deep experience and technology to provide smart, creative supply chain solutions that align with our customers’ business needs and bring efficient, on-time, measurable results to their bottom line.

A subsidiary of Burlington Northern Santa Fe, LLC, a Berkshire Hathaway company, BNSF Logistics specializes in movement of freight around the globe, leveraging uncommon service scope, resources, and financial depth. The company operates more than 25 offices throughout North America and has a network of Global Service Providers (GSPs) that have completed required due diligence and certified their understanding and willingness to comply with the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.

We offer a comprehensive suite of solutions across all modes, including:

-Transportation Execution
-Over the Road
-Rail
-Intermodal
-Heavy Haul/Over-Dimensional
-Air
-Ocean
-Managed Transportation
-Supply Chain Consulting
-Project Management
-Engineering Services
-Reverse Logistics
-Warehousing/Cross-Docking
-Custom House Brokerage
MISSION: Mission: At BNSF Logistics, we wanted to define something that gives deeper meaning to what we’re doing as an organization so rather than a mission, we have a purpose that unites all of us. The purpose of BNSF Logistics is We Deliver What Matters. Delivering what matters means that we deliver what matters for our customers, our employees, and our partners in our communities. It means we are constantly designing new and better ways to change the location of something and meet higher customer expectations. Our canvas is the entire globe – the air, the sea and all the land around us. And our paintbrushes are the latest technologies of the 21st century. We hire people who love to solve problems, who thrive in change, who demand to keep learning and who relish the opportunity to bring new and innovative ideas to our table, no matter what role they’re in. As a company, our performance is outstanding and our deepened focus on fulfilling our purpose will carry us to new heights.

NAME: LRW
DESCRIPTION:
LRW is a global market research consultancy differentiated by its ability to translate deep human understanding and sophisticated data analytics into business success for our clients. Voted #1 most innovative insights firm in North America and among the 20 largest market research consultancies in the world, we tackle business challenges with creativity, passion, and a collaborative orientation. We specialize in custom market research focused on brand equity, customer loyalty, market segmentation, advertising effectiveness, and new product development.

Founded in 1973, LRW is headquartered in Los Angeles with over 540 employees in 6 offices.

NAME: Privia Health
DESCRIPTION:
Privia Health is ranked one of the Top Workplaces in Healthcare for 2021!

Privia is empowering physicians and transforming healthcare.

Privia Health is a national physician organization that transforms the healthcare delivery experience for providers and consumers. By utilizing a platform of talent, tools, and highly enabling technology, we have a proven track record of developing and scaling physician groups to top-tier performance.

We promise every employee the ability to make a meaningful impact in the healthcare universe, the chance to collaborate with smart, committed people, and the opportunity to achieve their potential.

NAME: Goosehead Insurance
DESCRIPTION:
It all began in 2003, when Robyn Jones (a real estate investor) and Mark Jones (a Senior Partner at Bain & Co), had an idea that would disrupt and transform the insurance industry.

The strategy was simple: Provide a true concierge client experience that gives clients the power of choice from the top rated national and regional insurance carriers.

Instead of modeling Goosehead after other agencies, Mark started with a blank sheet of paper and designed a highly unique business model focused on providing the best service, the best value and the best experience for its clients

Combining a team of the most capable leaders in the industry and melding them together with cutting edge technology, Goosehead has become one of the largest and fastest-growing agencies in the business. Today, the company has over 400 franchise agency partners.

NAME: Eat Club
DESCRIPTION: EAT Club is the leading business-focused online food delivery company. Our innovative approach marries technology, curated food, and sophisticated logistics to offer employees quality lunch options and help build stronger organizations for employers. Since 2010, we've delivered over 10 million meals to 3,000+ customers with a 99.7% on-time delivery rate throughout the Bay Area, Los Angeles, and New York City.
MISSION:
Mission: EAT Club brings joy to offices and helps companies build great cultures through the power of food.

We satisfy personal tastes, foster team collaboration, and uniquely celebrate the individuality that powers a team.

We're on a mission to make food work for working people. From lunch plans to snack stands, we're helping companies big and small offer on-site food options that keep employees happy and engaged while on the job.

NAME: Bella Baby Photography
DESCRIPTION: Bella Baby is the innovator that is changing the playing field for in-hospital newborn photography. We are first to introduce the concept of a photo session meant to showcase life as it is in the natural moment, including siblings and family members, while using natural light and professional-grade equipment.

NAME: JG Wentworth
DESCRIPTION:
For more than 25 years, JG Wentworth has been focused on helping individuals overcome financial hardships in various ways.

We offer lump-sum payments to individuals in exchange for their future payment streams, which include payments from structured settlements, annuities, lottery prizes, and casino winnings. JG Wentworth also provides a Debt Relief Program, which allows us to negotiate with creditors on our client's behalf to help pay off or reduce their unsecured debts.

Our employees are the key to our success. With that always in the forefront of our mind, we strive to provide our team members with career growth opportunities and an exciting workplace environment.

With competitive compensation, a rewarding and challenging performance based environment, fun and exciting experiences, a dedicated and supportive employee culture, Corporate Social Responsibility opportunities and more, JG Wentworth is dedicated to helping you succeed!

For more information about J.G. Wentworth, please visit https://www.jgwentworth.com

The JG Wentworth Company is not affiliated with JG Wentworth Home Lending. The home lending business was sold to Freedom Mortgage in 2018.

NAME: Jersey Mike's
DESCRIPTION: Yo, you wants a sandwich? Jersey Mike's got 'em. Jersey Mike's Franchise Systems operates and franchises more than 400 Jersey Mike's Subs in about 30 states, mostly in the Southeast. (Surprisingly, it has relatively few shops in the Garden State.) The quick-service eateries specialize in hot and cold submarine-style sandwiches, including such staples as Jersey Mike's Famous Philly, Meatball and Cheese, and The Original Italian. Other menu items include wrap-style sandwiches, salads, and sides. Founded in 1956, the Jersey Mike's has been controlled by CEO Peter Cancro since 1974.

NAME: Moma
DESCRIPTION: The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) acquires modern and contemporary art from around the world and hosts exhibits and film programs. It also supports research and publications related to its mission. MoMA's collection includes more than 150,000 works of art, such as paintings, sculptures, drawings, prints, and photographs; among these are works of Alexander Calder, Paul Cézanne, Vincent van Gogh, Jasper Johns, and Jackson Pollack. The collection also includes about 22,000 films, videos, and related works. MoMA was founded in 1929 as a progressive alternative to traditional museums. A significant renovation and expansion of the museum, which nearly doubled its space, was completed in 2004.

NAME: SoftRock
DESCRIPTION:
SoftRock is where software rocks. With a strong focus on customer acquisition, engagement and support, SoftRock provides visionary software solutions to a wide range of partners. The software developed bridges the gap between technology and people by focusing on customer acquisition, engagement and support.

SoftRock's graphic designers, software engineers and content creators collaborate to create websites as well as mobile and social media applications designed to be fresh, elegant and engaging. SoftRock is dedicated to exceeding expectations,by constantly evaluating the user experience, partner feedback and emerging technology in order to improve products.

The SoftRock team of copywriters, media buyers and media analysts excels at generating traffic through targeted advertising. SoftRock's copy and traffic sources are rigorously monitored and modified as necessary to ensure that their partners’ metrics for success and quality are exceeded.

NAME: Saama Technologies
DESCRIPTION: Saama is the #1 AI clinical analytics platform company, enabling the life sciences industry to conduct faster and safer clinical development and regulatory programs. Today, 50 biotech companies—including many of the top 20 pharmaceutical companies—use Saama’s award-winning Life Science Analytics Cloud (LSAC) platform to accelerate more than 1,500 studies. LSAC’s rich applications facilitate unprecedented and authoritative oversight of comprehensive clinical research data, enabling companies to file New Drug Applications (NDAs) more efficiently and bring drugs to market faster. Discover more at www.saama.com and follow @SaamaTechInc on Twitter.
MISSION: Mission: Saama offers biopharmaceuticals unprecedented, authoritative oversight, governance, and intelligent workflow of clinical studies. Our undertaking is to accelerate the clinical outcomes while reducing the time, cost, and complexity of long-drawn-out drug development processes by 50% over the next decade.

NAME: PJM Interconnection
DESCRIPTION:
PJM works behind the scenes to keep the power flowing for 65 million people in 13 states and the District of Columbia. PJM is a neutral, regulated organization that directs the operation of power lines and generators for many different owners. PJM acts as an agent to provide fair access to the transmission system for competing suppliers and electricity users.

Operating the electric system is a balancing act that requires continuous monitoring of the system. PJM reacts instantly to changes in demand, equipment problems, weather conditions and other factors to maintain safe and reliable service while meeting customer needs for electricity when and where it’s needed.

PJM also administers competitive wholesale markets for large blocks of electricity – similar to the way the stock market works. In addition, PJM conducts a long-range planning process that identifies what changes and additions to the grid are needed to ensure reliability and the successful operation of the wholesale markets.
MISSION:
Mission: As the primary task, to ensure the safety, reliability and security of the bulk electric power system.
Create and operate robust, competitive and non-discriminatory electric power markets.
Understand customer needs and deliver valued service to meet those needs in a cost-efficient manner.
Achieve productivity through the efficient union of superior knowledge workers and technology advances.

NAME: USHEALTH Advisors
DESCRIPTION:
About USHA - 48 Awards For Business Excellence in Just 8 Years!!!

Nowhere else in America will you find a better opportunity to enjoy personal satisfaction and professional achievement... because nowhere else in America will you find a company that is more committed to your success than USHA. You will work directly with Americas self-employed, small business owners and individuals to help them access an array of innovative and affordable benefit solutions. As demands for our products continue to increase, you will advise clients on a portfolio of solutions that best fits their individual needs and budget... in one seamless package. We provide service that is fast, fair, and caring. Because the only thing better than delivering a superior product, is seeing the difference it makes in the lives of our customers.

NAME:
Opower
Now known as Oracle
DESCRIPTION:
Opower is an enterprise software company that helps utilities elevate the customer experience. Energy providers use Opower's customer engagement platform to deliver proactive, digital communications that raise customer satisfaction, manage energy demand, and lower service costs. Opower's software is deployed to more than 95 utilities worldwide and reaches more than 50 million homes and businesses.

Opower partnered with its first utility client in 2007 and has since grown into a well-capitalized business with more than 560 employees and offices in Arlington, Virginia, San Francisco, London, Singapore and Tokyo. Opower works with 28 of the 50 largest U.S. electric utilities and has utility clients in nine different countries. Opower helps utilities like these deliver an improved customer experience that drives business value, saves energy and money, and helps reduce carbon emissions.

NAME: Alegeus
DESCRIPTION: Alegeus is the market leader in consumer-directed healthcare solutions, offering the industry’s most comprehensive platform for the administration of healthcare benefit accounts, the industry’s most widely-used benefit debit card, and powerful engagement solutions to help consumers maximize savings and optimize spending for their healthcare. Over 300 clients – including health insurance plans, third-party administrators and financial institutions – leverage Alegeus’ deep expertise and proven technology to administer benefit accounts for more than 29 million members and process more than $8.9 billion in consumer healthcare payments annually. As the healthcare and benefit markets continue to evolve, Alegeus delivers solutions that enable clients to evolve their service offerings, operate their businesses more efficiently, and focus on their customers.
MISSION:
Mission: Enabling the future winners of consumer-directed healthcare.

Helping clients win in a rapidly changing marketplace – with the industry’s largest and most comprehensive consumer healthcare funding platform.

A culture of innovation and client focus: We foster an environment that empowers, engages and challenges our employees to maximize their potential and lead the industry in their achievements.

NAME: FareHarbor
DESCRIPTION:
FareHarbor is the leading booking platform for tours, activities, and attractions. We believe in better software—a product that makes businesses more productive and profitable, and we're unapologetically excited about this industry; all 550+ of us.

We're a modern team distributed across 7 offices in the US, Sydney, and Amsterdam. We're always in touch in all the ways you'd expect, like video calls and slack rooms.

We founded FareHarbor on the firm belief of doing right by our clients. So, best-in-class customer support is at the heart of everything we do. We move fast, shipping new features weekly and evolving and growing to meet our customer's unique needs.

We'd love to have you on the team. You'll interact with our new and existing clients and have a direct hand in how we grow.

NAME: Playworks
DESCRIPTION: At Playworks we believe in the power of play to bring out the best in every kid. We are changing school climate by leveraging the power of safe, fun, and healthy play at school every day. We create a place for every kid on the playground to feel included, be active, and build valuable social and emotional skills. We partner with schools, districts, and after-school programs to provide a service or mix of services including on-site coaches, professional training for school staff who support recess, and consultative partnerships. Playworks' aim is that 3.5 million children in 7,000 elementary schools experience safe, healthy play every day by December 2020.
MISSION: Mission: Playworks’s mission is to improve the health and well-being of children by increasing opportunities for physical activity and safe, meaningful play. Today, Playworks is the leading national nonprofit leveraging the power of play to transform children’s social and emotional health. Playworks currently serves more than 2,000 schools in 23 U.S. cities, and reaches 1 million students directly and through professional training services.

NAME: Zwicker & Associates
DESCRIPTION:
The Right Way is the Only Way

What started in 1991 as a small practice now spans from coast to coast and has earned the trust of the world’s most prestigious lenders and financial institutions.

Today, Zwicker is one of the largest and most respected debt collection firms in the country. But it’s not our size that sets us apart. It’s our people. We’ve grown because we all pull in the same direction. Each person here strives to do the right thing, the right way.

NAME: DMC Atlanta
DESCRIPTION:
DMC Atlanta is a people-first, humanity-positive company focused on the growth, experience, and contribution of our team members. We help our people achieve their dreams and goals by providing our Mobility, Technology, and Telecommunication clients with first-class representation in the retail space, delivering lifelong customers and positive brand awareness through connecting personally and seeking to brighten the day of each person we encounter. The more we help our clients and customers, the more opportunity we create for our team.

We started slowly with eight people and one client - working relentlessly to build a strong foundation. We believe that true, long-lasting success comes only when explosive growth is preceded by the development of strong roots.

We also believe that quality business depends upon people of varying backgrounds, resources, and skills. Our philosophy of 100% internal, merit-based, organic promotion, and growth guarantees team members career opportunities and the growth potential to realize their goals, regardless of previous experience or personal background.

Because of this philosophy, we have grown exponentially to work with a large variety of clients in over sixty offices across dozens of states, and have plans of expanding our vision to include over 100,000 people by 2030, each living a great life of prosperity and happiness.
MISSION: Mission: DMC Atlanta will develop individuals, personally and professionally, into leaders through teamwork and fundamental management training techniques. We will promote team success as well as individual achievements in a consistently positive atmosphere. Everyone at DMC Atlanta will understand that they hold a key role within the team.

NAME: NCSA Next College Student Athlete
DESCRIPTION:
NCSA is the world's largest and most successful collegiate athletic recruiting network because our focus has always been on finding the best college fit for our student-athletes. We believe the right athletic and academic fit can launch a lifetime of success.

Twenty years ago, recruiting used to be complicated and time consuming. But in 2000, NCSA flipped the industry on its head. As former athletes and coaches, we experienced the old process--and we saw a way to make things better with digital technology.

Today, NCSA is the world's largest and most successful college athletic recruiting network. With more than 2,200 reviews, our 4.9-star Google Rating speaks for itself. Each year, thousands of student-athletes get connected to the 35,000 verified college coaches across 34 sports in our network.

Giving back has always been core to our mission at NCSA. Our goal has always been to help every qualified athlete--regardless of their financial situation.
MISSION:
Mission: NCSA is the world’s largest and most successful collegiate athletic recruiting network because our focus has always been on finding the best college fit for our student-athletes. We believe the right athletic and academic fit can launch a lifetime of success.

Giving back has always been core to our mission at NCSA. Our goal has always been to help every qualified athlete—regardless of their financial situation.

NAME: Aureus Medical Group
DESCRIPTION:
Aureus Medical Group® is a national leader in healthcare staffing. Whether it’s maintaining continuity of care or expanding career horizons, Aureus Medical impacts thousands of lives each day by connecting skilled healthcare professionals with exciting career opportunities in hospitals and medical facilities across the country.

With more than 35 years of experience, Aureus Medical offers travel (national contract), direct hire (full-time) and Match Hire(R) career options. Areas of specialty include Nursing, Imaging, Therapy, Medical Laboratory, Cardiopulmonary, and Advanced Practice.

Aureus Medical is the largest affiliate of Omaha-based C&A Industries, a leading provider of human capital management solutions for more than 50 years.

NAME: Quantcast
DESCRIPTION: Quantcast is an audience intelligence and measurement company headquartered in San Francisco. Combining machine learning, a privacy-by-design approach, and live data drawn from more than 100 million online destinations, Quantcast provides software, information and advertising services for marketers, publishers and advertising agencies worldwide. Founded in 2006, Quantcast has employees in 20 offices across 10 countries.

NAME: RAPP
DESCRIPTION:
OUR WHOLE JOB IS TO CONVINCE ONE PERSON
To click that button. Watch that film. Buy that thing.
To do that, we must get the most motivating message to them at the most appropriate time.
Good thing that our data analysts know who that person is. Our strategists understand what they want. Our creatives and technologists know how to get it to them.
Make one person do something to build a bond.
Repeat it with millions to build a brand.
We’re here for the ones in their millions.
We are fiercely individual.

NAME: TierPoint
DESCRIPTION: Meeting clients where they are on their journey to IT transformation, TierPoint is a leading provider of secure, connected data center and cloud solutions at the edge of the internet. The company has one of the largest customer bases in the industry, with thousands of clients ranging from the public to private sectors, from small businesses to Fortune 500 enterprises. TierPoint also has one of the largest and most geographically diversified footprints in the nation, with over 40 world-class data centers in 20 markets and 8 multitenant cloud pods, connected by a coast-to-coast network. Led by a proven management team, TierPoint’s highly experienced IT professionals offer a comprehensive solution portfolio of private, multitenant, managed hyperscale, and hybrid cloud, plus colocation, disaster recovery, security, and other managed IT services.

NAME: Clover Health
DESCRIPTION:
At Clover, we’re working to solve the country’s most complex and expensive problem: improving healthcare. Clover Health is a Medicare Advantage insurer that combines technology and preventive care to lower costs and increase the quality of life for those who need it most.

Our employees are people with diverse strengths, experiences and backgrounds, who share a passion for improving people’s lives. Inspired to rethink how insurance works to better serve the disabled and senior populations, our mission attracts empathetic and tenacious individuals dedicated to making a positive impact on the world.

Does this sound like you? Join us!

NAME: Convene
DESCRIPTION: Convene (www.convene.com) designs and services premium places to work, meet, and host inspiring events. Through strategic partnerships with prominent commercial landlords, Convene operates a network of hospitality-driven locations in Class A office buildings across major U.S. cities, with plans to expand globally. Convene has raised $260M in equity funding to date, and has been named one of America’s 100 Most Promising Companies by Forbes and a Best Workplace by both Inc. and Fortune Magazine.

NAME: Publicis North America
DESCRIPTION:
You can either adapt to change, ignore it, or lead it. At Publicis Kaplan Thaler, we help our clients take the lead. For change that helps them redefine the competitive landscape, leap ahead of the competition, become part of the public consciousness, and start a movement.

On July 12, 2012, Publicis New York, part of Publicis Worldwide in the USA, and the Kaplan Thaler Group, part of the Paris-based Publicis Groupe, merged to form Publicis Kaplan Thaler. The combined New York-based entity, with over 650 employees, became the U.S. flagship agency within the Publicis Worldwide Network of over 200 offices in 82 countries.
MISSION: Mission: The merger combined the strengths of Publicis New York’s vast global expertise with the Kaplan Thaler Group’s reputation for building iconic brands that became part of the culture. From the onset, Publicis Kaplan Thaler offered clients an entrepreneurial spirit with global scale that is idea-driven across all communications platforms. The agency is fully integrated with digital, social and technology at its core

NAME: MISO
DESCRIPTION: Midcontinent Independent System Operator (MISO) is an independent, not-for-profit organization that delivers safe, cost-effective electric power across 15 U.S. states and the Canadian province of Manitoba. MISO is committed to reliable, nondiscriminatory operation of the bulk power transmission system and collaborating with all stakeholders to create cost-effective and innovative solutions for our changing industry. MISO operates one of the world’s largest energy markets with more than $29 billion in annual gross market energy transactions.

NAME: The Emmes Company
DESCRIPTION:
The Emmes Company, LLC is a private Contract Research Organization (CRO). Headquartered in Rockville, Maryland, Emmes employs over six hundred staff worldwide with offices located in Frederick, Maryland, Tysons Corner, Virginia, Vancouver, Canada and Bangalore, India. Ranked as a top area workplace of choice by the Washington Post, Emmes fosters an environment of collaboration, professional growth, and exceptional work life balance.

Our studies impact public health initiatives on a global scale occurring in more than sixty countries spanning across six continents. We are dedicated to providing statistical and epidemiological expertise, computer systems deployment, data management, study monitoring, regulatory guidance, and overall operational support to clients engaged in biomedical research. Emmes offers support for the entire process of clinical trials from study design and protocol development through data analysis and manuscript generation.

NAME: NRECA
DESCRIPTION:
The National Rural Electric Cooperative Association (NRECA) is the trade association representing close to 900 electric cooperatives that provide power to over 42 million Americans in 47 states. We set the standard for industry leadership across many fields including: engineering, energy technology, insurance and financial services and advocacy. We provide tools, resources and training to implement cutting edge programs/technology at America’s Electric Cooperatives. We are committed to growing a next generation workforce that is prepared to lead the utility industry of the 21st century. We are also committed to community at home and abroad. Everyday, members of our staff are working to ensure that people in developing countries can benefit from the opportunities electricity brings.

With a strategic approach rooted in member engagement and service excellence, we deliver programs and services that improve the lives of millions of Americans.

NAME:
Momentum Worldwide
Part of McCann Worldgroup
DESCRIPTION:
Momentum is an agency of doers.

We make the industry’s most disruptive, entertaining, shareable, unforgettable experiences for our clients and their fans.

We do it by bringing people closer to what they love, in original and unexpected ways.

Whether it’s a physical activation, a virtual experience, or a piece of unique branded content, it’s all part of what we call the Total Brand Experience — ideas that solve business challenges, through best-in-class Consulting, Strategy, Analytics, Experience Design, and Production.

NAME: Russell Reynolds
DESCRIPTION: Russell Reynolds Associates is a global leadership advisory and search firm. Our 470+ consultants in 46 offices work with public, private and nonprofit organizations across all industries and regions. We help our clients build teams of transformational leaders who can meet today’s challenges and anticipate the digital, economic and political trends that are reshaping the global business environment. From helping boards with their structure, culture and effectiveness to identifying, assessing and defining the best leadership for organizations, our teams bring their decades of expertise to help clients address their most complex leadership issues. We exist to improve the way the world is led. www.russellreynolds.com

NAME: Sumo Logic
DESCRIPTION: Sumo Logic is the pioneer in continuous intelligence, a new category of software, which enables organizations of all sizes to address the data challenges and opportunities presented by digital transformation, modern applications, and cloud computing. The Sumo Logic Continuous Intelligence Platform™ automates the collection, ingestion, and analysis of application, infrastructure, security, and IoT data to derive actionable insights within seconds. More than 2,100 customers rely on Sumo Logic to build, run, and secure their modern applications and cloud infrastructures. Only Sumo Logic delivers its platform as a true, multi-tenant SaaS architecture, across multiple use-cases, enabling businesses to thrive in the Intelligence Economy.
MISSION: Mission: Our mission is to democratize data analytics, making it accessible, simple and powerful for businesses of all sizes to build, run and secure their organizations. With Sumo Logic, customers can harness the power of machine data to gain operational business and customer in advantage and differentiated customer experiences.

NAME: Thumbtack
DESCRIPTION:
When you need to hire someone — a landscaper, a DJ, anyone — Thumbtack finds them for you for free.

Thumbtack connects millions of people with local professionals for their projects. With ~500 different services to choose from, you’ll find pretty much anyone you’re looking to hire. A contractor to remodel your kitchen. A tutor to teach you French. A dog trainer to save your furniture from puppy accidents. An officiant, florist, caterer (and every other vendor you might need) for your perfect wedding.

Local businesses across the country use Thumbtack, too. Our product helps them connect with customers, get hired and make a living doing what they’re great at.

Thumbtack is headquartered in San Francisco and backed by Sequoia Capital, Tiger Global Management, Javelin Investment Partners, Baillie Gifford and Google Capital.

NAME: Waxing the City
DESCRIPTION: Waxing the City was founded in 2003 by four innovative women with both the passion and expertise to open a studio dedicated to waxing. The business grew from a one-room studio in the trendy LoDo neighborhood of Denver, to a regional phenomenon. One studio led to two, two led to two more, and so on. Waxing the City is now taking convenience to the next level with a global expansion. The founders are still actively involved today as Waxing the City expands. From the start, our founders were committed to hiring the best waxing technicians and making them better. Every licensed esthetician at Waxing the City completes an extensive training course before they serve clients. Our approach is so unique that our highly-trained waxers have a special name: Cerologists.
MISSION:
Mission: At Waxing the City, our licensed estheticians are not only waxing specialists, they are the ultimate professionals at their craft. This led us to create our very own title of Cerologist™ technicians, which combines "cera" (Latin for wax) with "ologist" (to indicate their level of education and expertise).
Our passion is to create an environment where you have full confidence in our professionalism, one where you can’t imagine going anywhere else for your Cerology® waxing services!

NAME: LegalShield
DESCRIPTION:
Protecting people is our business. It has been for more than 40 years. In 1969, our founder, Harland Stonecipher, had an epiphany. He found himself financially unprepared for the legal costs he incurred from an accident even though it was not his fault. From that day forward, he was determined to make sure everyone has access to legal protection. No matter how traumatic or trivial the situation. That’s how LegalShield was born.

Today, LegalShield, continues our mission by providing legal protection to over a million members in all 50 states and four Canadian provinces. Our network of dedicated lawyers works diligently to keep individuals, families and businesses safe, 24/7/365.

NAME: CryoLife
DESCRIPTION: CryoLife preserves lives by conserving the tissues that sustain them. The company takes human heart valves and blood vessels from deceased volunteer donors, processes them, and stores them in liquid nitrogen freezers (a process called cryopreservation). It then ships them to surgeons nationwide, who implant them during cardiac and vascular repair procedures. For some preserved tissue, the company uses its proprietary SynerGraft technology, which reduces the presence of donor cells and makes the tissue more compatible with the recipient. CryoLife also develops implantable biomaterials, including BioGlue, an adhesive used to seal internal surgical wounds.

NAME: United Therapeutics
DESCRIPTION: United Therapeutics Corporation is a biotechnology company focused on the development and commercialization of unique products to address the unmet medical needs of patients with chronic and life-threatening conditions. We have four approved products on the market today and we are not stopping there! From the United States to Europe to the Asia Pacific, we are proud of our multicultural business environment where employees can collaborate with people all over the world. As a group, we are relentless in our pursuit of “medicines for life” and continue our research into treatments for pulmonary arterial hypertension, cancer, and some of the world’s most complicated viral illnesses.
MISSION:
Mission: Develop the best medicines possible from our intellectual property.
Conduct the most insightful clinical trials of our medicines.
Achieve superior communication and awareness of our products among physicians.
Grow our business to be in the top quintile of our peers.
Achieve our goals by doing the right thing and using the highest ethical standards.

NAME: CPI Security
DESCRIPTION:
At CPI Security, we lead the Security and Home Automation industry, providing sophisticated, cutting edge technology and convenient, unparalleled customer service to our surging residential, commercial, and new construction customer bases. Currently ranked in the Top 10 Security companies in the nation, our double-digit growth stems from our dedicated team of over 700 expert security industry professionals.

Consistently awarded “Best Places to Work” year-over-year, we provide an innovative and fast-paced environment that challenges our employees to provide insight and solutions that exceeds customer’s expectations on how they buy, install, and experience security and home automation. We offer employees the freedom, resources, and tools they need to make a positive impact in their careers
and the communities they work in.
MISSION: Mission: At CPI Security, the commitment to our customers goes beyond providing innovative solutions to make their lives safer, easier, and more convenient. We care about the communities we serve and invest our time and contributions in your local police, fire and emergency medical departments as well as many community and charitable partners.

NAME:
HEINEKEN USA
Part of Heineken
DESCRIPTION:
We are a proud family with rich heritage and history. We are passionate about the beer and cider that we sell. At our core we are pioneers, mavericks, and entrepreneurs.

We create value for our customers through our dynamic portfolio of upscale international brands… Brands that are all about substance rather than status; social rather than exclusive; personalized rather than mass. We set the highest standards of integrity and social responsibility.

We connect people by creating meaningful experiences and memorable moments. Every day you have the opportunity to be extraordinary and leave your mark.

We Brew Experiences That Inspire Legendary Lives.

NAME: Townsquare Interactive
DESCRIPTION:
As a people-centric digital marketing company, our primary goal is to connect small business owners across the country with their target audiences. We do that by building comprehensive online presences designed to get business owners found online, attract customers and grow their businesses.

Our people are passionate about helping business owners succeed, and they know the value of dedication and expertise. That’s why our clients never have to wait in online help queues for support. They work with one digital marketing specialist throughout their campaigns, and they always have their specialist’s direct phone number and email address.

Our people make us who we are, so we invest heavily in developing them professionally and personally. We embrace our strengths and strive to provide unique opportunities to move up and dominate.

So, what do we do, exactly? We build online presences that can be as simple or as complex as needed. Some of our clients might opt for a website only, while others will want search engine optimization or reputation monitoring services—still others will invest in programmatic advertising and other extremely effective marketing products.

As the world enters the age of automation and intelligence, we are hyper-focused on being the most people-centric organization in the digital marketing space. Our team operates with a level of personal service unlike any other, which has been integral to our rapid growth.

NAME:
HEINEKEN USA
Part of Heineken
DESCRIPTION:
We are a proud family with rich heritage and history. We are passionate about the beer and cider that we sell. At our core we are pioneers, mavericks, and entrepreneurs.

We create value for our customers through our dynamic portfolio of upscale international brands… Brands that are all about substance rather than status; social rather than exclusive; personalized rather than mass. We set the highest standards of integrity and social responsibility.

We connect people by creating meaningful experiences and memorable moments. Every day you have the opportunity to be extraordinary and leave your mark.

We Brew Experiences That Inspire Legendary Lives.

NAME: Brain Balance
DESCRIPTION: Brain Balance™ is a nationwide system of specialized achievement centers that offer the groundbreaking Brain Balance Program®. The Brain Balance Program® is a highly effective, drug-free approach to address the underlying issues in most of the behavioral, developmental, and learning disorders that affect so many children today.

NAME: American Bar Association
DESCRIPTION: The ABA is the largest voluntary association of lawyers in the world. Our members include lawyers from all specialties, judges, court administrators, legal academics and law students. As the national voice of the legal profession, we work to improve the administration of justice, promote programs that assist lawyers and judges in their work, accredit law schools, provide continuing legal education and work to build public understanding around the world of the importance of the rule of law. While primarily based in Chicago and Washington, D.C., our 900 staff members stretch across the globe through our rule of law and other programs.

NAME: Townsquare Interactive
DESCRIPTION:
As a people-centric digital marketing company, our primary goal is to connect small business owners across the country with their target audiences. We do that by building comprehensive online presences designed to get business owners found online, attract customers and grow their businesses.

Our people are passionate about helping business owners succeed, and they know the value of dedication and expertise. That’s why our clients never have to wait in online help queues for support. They work with one digital marketing specialist throughout their campaigns, and they always have their specialist’s direct phone number and email address.

Our people make us who we are, so we invest heavily in developing them professionally and personally. We embrace our strengths and strive to provide unique opportunities to move up and dominate.

So, what do we do, exactly? We build online presences that can be as simple or as complex as needed. Some of our clients might opt for a website only, while others will want search engine optimization or reputation monitoring services—still others will invest in programmatic advertising and other extremely effective marketing products.

As the world enters the age of automation and intelligence, we are hyper-focused on being the most people-centric organization in the digital marketing space. Our team operates with a level of personal service unlike any other, which has been integral to our rapid growth.

NAME: Addison Group
DESCRIPTION:
Addison Group offers a full suite of professional services including consulting,executive search, staffing and recruiting through its network of companies and offices throughout the United States. Specializing in IT, Finance & Accounting, Healthcare, Administration, Human Resources and Engineering.

Addison Group's leadership team has a transformative vision for the staffing industry that has led the organization from humble beginnings to nationwide success, repeatedly winning awards as one of the fastest growing private staffing firms. Addison Group sets the bar for its workplace environment and was recently identified as one of Chicago's Top 100 Workplaces (Chicago Tribune) in addition to various industry awards for its exceptional Client and Candidate service.

Our culture is truly People First, Process Second and we offer a simple value proposition: find solutions that work equally for both our clients and our candidates. It sets us apart…and it’s just good business.
MISSION: Mission: At Addison Group, we take a consultative approach, delivering people with the precise skills and knowledge each client needs to fill important positions and solve specific business problems. What’s more, we work to understand company cultures, processes, and team dynamics and hand select pre-vetted and experienced candidates to ensure a perfect match.

NAME: Code42
DESCRIPTION:
Code42 is the leader in insider threat detection, investigation and response. With our software, security professionals can protect corporate data and reduce insider risk while fostering an open and collaborative culture for employees. We are data centric, performance minded and security obsessed.

You belong at Code42 if you crave being a part of an energetically collaborative culture, you want to be an equal voice to drive innovation and security is always top of mind. We look for authentic people who are inquisitive, enjoy solving complex problems, think creatively and provide diverse insights to help us all think differently and thrive together.

Don’t wait. #BeCode42
MISSION: Mission: Code42 is committed to providing all employees with engaging and challenging work, opportunity for growth, an equal voice to drive innovation, and an environment that cultivates authenticity. In return, we look for people who are inquisitive, enjoy solving complex problems, collaborate effectively, think creatively and provide diverse insights to help us all think better and differently. Come join us and #BeCode42

NAME: American Medical Association
DESCRIPTION:
The AMA strengthens trust in the medical profession by promoting physician professionalism and accountability. Our core commitment to ethics, quality, professional development and public health policy is critical to the foundation on which physicians are trained and empowered to uphold the highest standards in medicine and in the delivery of quality patient care to a diverse population.

The AMA offers competitive salaries, including an incentive plan; excellent benefits and progressive technology. Our office is a business casual environment and we respect work-life balance. The American Medical Association is located in downtown Chicago and is convenient to all public transportation.
MISSION:
Mission: The AMA Mission is to promote the art and science of medicine and the betterment of public health.

We are an equal opportunity employer, committed to diversity in our workforce. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment. As an EOE/AA employer, the American Medical Association will not discriminate in its employment practices due to an applicant’s race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity and veteran or disability status.

NAME: Interactions
DESCRIPTION:
Interactions is a virtual company allowing employees to work from anywhere in the US.

Interactions provides Intelligent Virtual Assistants that seamlessly combine artificial intelligence and human understanding to enable businesses and consumers to engage in productive conversations. With flexible products and solutions designed to meet the growing demand for unified, multichannel customer care, Interactions is delivering significant cost savings and unprecedented customer experience for some of the largest brands in the world.

For more information, visit www.interactions.com.

DESCRIPTION:

NAME: Angie's List
DESCRIPTION:
From gutter cleaning to remodeling and everything in between, Angie’s List is in the business of taking the stress out of home services — both for homeowners and home service providers!

As the trusted go-to resource for homeowners seeking to hire help for home projects, Angie’s List offers more than 10 million reviews to connect homeowners with the right pros for more than 700 home improvement, maintenance and repair tasks. We’ve been setting the standard for the home improvement industry for more than 20 years, and we’re always seeking ways to set the bar even higher.

NAME: Myers and Stauffer
DESCRIPTION:
Unlike the typical CPA firm that handles taxes for people and businesses, our firm focuses solely on state and federal government programs, from state Medicaid agencies to the U.S. Department of Justice.

Since 1977, Myers and Stauffer has provided accounting, program integrity, consulting and analysis services to state and federal agencies. These agencies are challenged to deliver their services to members of the public in an efficient and responsible manner. We are exceptionally sensitive to the accountability that is expected of our government clients.

Expertise, proven effectiveness, customized solutions and unmatched client service are the hallmarks of Myers and Stauffer. Maybe that’s why we have a 97% client retention rate. With more than 800 employees across 18 offices, exceptional client service is the fabric of our culture. We take to heart the mission at the core of what state and federal programs are delivering: affordable, accessible care for our most vulnerable citizens.
MISSION:
Mission: We have developed innovative processes and procedures that give our clients the accurate data and quality reporting they need to make defensible policy decisions and increase efficiencies in their programs.

No other firm can match our breadth of experience, government health care knowledge, staff resources or our commitment to high quality service and deliverables.

We’re not your typical accounting firm...this is accounting and analysis with a higher purpose.
